rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed to provide a welcoming space that aligns with Vastu principles by ensuring the main door faces north or east. It features modern decor, adequate lighting and serves as the transition area from outdoors to indoors.

rooms.name: Living Room & Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-concept living room and dining space designed for a joint family, with flexible seating arrangements, built-in storage units and ample natural light. The layout respects Vastu by ensuring the dining area is positioned in the northeast corner.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern kitchen integrated into the living area yet separated by semi-open spaces. It includes state-of-the-art appliances, ample counter space and is designed to have a clear view of the entrance for security while respecting Vastu guidelines for proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom, private study area and a balcony. The room faces east or north to promote positivity and health in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A guest bedroom designed for additional family members, offering sufficient space, good ventilation and natural light while being located away from the main entrance to ensure privacy.

rooms.name: Joint Family Room
rooms.description: An extra communal room designated for joint family gatherings. It is centrally located within the layout to facilitate easy access by all household members, following Vastu recommendations for balance and harmony.

rooms.name: Open Terrace / Verandah
rooms.description: A spacious outdoor terrace integrated into the ground floor, offering a transitional space between indoors and outdoors. This area is designed to serve as an extended living space or garden area, aligning with local building norms.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Large front door facing north or east, ensuring positive energy flow per Vastu guidelines, and complemented by sufficient natural light entering the space.

openings.name: Side Entrance / Service Door
openings.description: A secondary entrance for service areas that is discreet yet accessible, designed to maintain privacy and security in a joint family setting.

openings.name: Windows and Balcony Doors
openings.description: Strategically placed windows ensuring adequate cross ventilation and natural lighting. Windows are oriented according to Vastu principles with the master bedroom facing east or north, and additional windows to support energy flow throughout the apartment.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom Suite
rooms.description: An enhanced version of the ground floor master bedroom with a larger space including an attached bathroom and private balcony. This room is oriented in the favorable north or east direction.

rooms.name: Study / Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated space for work and study, offering privacy and ample natural light, designed with modern furniture and adequate storage.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: A separate bathroom to serve guests. It is strategically located near the guest bedroom for convenience while ensuring proper ventilation.

openings.name: Balcony Access Doors
openings.description: Doors leading from rooms on the first floor to the outdoor terrace, ensuring seamless connectivity and adherence to Vastu principles regarding openness and natural light.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A modern staircase that connects ground and first floors. It is centrally located to facilitate easy movement within the bungalow while maintaining privacy for each level.

rooms.name: Two-Car Garage
rooms.description: A spacious two-car garage designed to accommodate modern vehicles. It includes additional storage space and utility areas, adhering to local building norms.

openings.name: Garden Access
openings.description: Designated pathways and openings from the living areas leading to a large garden. The layout is designed to maximize green space while ensuring that the garden complements the overall aesthetics of the bungalow.
